item.title: Amy add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Amy add a quote by Jim Morrison
item.description: "Where's your will to be weird?" -- Jim Morrison

item.title: Amy add a quote by Judy Garland
item.description: "Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else." -- Judy Garland

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "No sympathy for the devil; keep that in mind. Buy the ticket, take the ride...and if it occasionally gets a little heavier than what you had in mind, well...maybe chalk it off to forced conscious expansion: Tune in, freak out, get beaten." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "She generally gave herself very good advice, (though she very seldom followed it)." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Amy add a quote by Carolyn Keene
item.description: "I love Nancy Drew!" -- Carolyn Keene

item.title: Amy add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "Maybe this world is another planet’s hell." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Amy add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Amy add a quote by Joyce Carol Oates
item.description: "I never change, I simply become more myself." -- Joyce Carol Oates

item.title: Amy add a quote by kay redfield jamison
item.description: "the intensity, glory, and absolute assuredness if my mind's flight made it very difficult for me to believe once i was better, that the illness was one i should willingly give up....moods are such an essential part of the substance of life, of one's notion of oneself, that even psychotic extremes in mood and behavior somehow can be seen as temporary, even understandable reactions to what life has dealt....even though the depressions that inevitably followed nearly cost me my life." -- kay redfield jamison

item.title: Amy add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Amy add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Amy add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Luxury is not a necessity to me, but beautiful and good things are." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Amy add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Dreams are necessary to life." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Amy add a quote by George Harrison
item.description: "If you don't know where you're going, any road'll take you there" -- George Harrison

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "When the going gets weird, the weird turn professional." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Some may never live, but the crazy never die." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "It never got weird enough for me." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I have a theory that the truth is never told during the nine-to-five hours." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "The highways are crowded with people who drive as if their sole purpose in getting behind the wheel is to avenge every wrong done them by man, beast or fate. The only thing that keeps them in line is their fear of death, jail and lawsuits." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "So we shall let the reader answer this question for himself: who is the happier man, he who has braved the storm of life and lived or he who has stayed securely on shore and merely existed?" -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Life has become immeasurably better since I have been forced to stop taking it seriously." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "A man who procrastinates in his choosing will inevitably have his choice made for him by circumstance." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Amy add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "The possession of knowledge does not kill the sense of wonder and mystery. There is always more mystery." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Amy add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Societies in decline have no use for visionaries." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Amy add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Each contact with a human being is so rare, so precious, one should preserve it." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Amy add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "We can't stop here, this is bat country!" -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Amy add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "It was obvious that he was a man who marched through life to the rhythms of some drum I would never hear." -- Hunter S. Thompson
